item.title: UML Sequence Diagram
item.description: UML Sequence Diagram Inter-object behaviour: interactions between objects. Interaction: how data is exchanged between interaction partners. Interaction partners: - Human (lectures, administrator, …) - Non-human (sever, printer, executable software, …)
